caption:
This photograph captures a breathtaking natural scene of a dense forest covered in snow. The forest primarily consists of tall coniferous trees that appear heavy with snow, casting shadows in some parts, indicating either early morning or late afternoon sunlight. The sun is positioned just above the tree line on the right half of the image, which creates a dramatic interplay of light and shadow across the scene.

The light breaks through in beams, illuminating the snowy trees with a soft glow and creating a mystical atmosphere. The background is shrouded in a haze, possibly mist or low clouds, which adds a layer of depth and mystery to the image. The overall feel is serene and cold, evoking the quiet ruggedness of winter landscapes. The color palette is dominated by the blues and whites of the snow and the dark greens and browns of the trees, punctuated by the bright, nearly white light of the sun.
title: A long shot of mature trees in olympic national timberland in Washington.  Near the Olympic National Park, Washington.  From the environmental protection agencys documerica collection, "in praise of forests".  For additional images see fiche #s 209, 210, 211, 212, and 213.  Entheos.  April, 1973.
